name: You Have To Remember
description:
Please be aware that this game focuses on traumatic events in the main character's past. If you are easily triggered by traumatic events, please do not play this game.

Follow the story of Abby after her therapist tells her that the only way to escape her trauma is to go back to where it first began. Dig deep into the depths of her mind, reliving her past in both the good, and the bad ways.

From her childhood to her wedding, experience 12 different times in her life that stuck with her deeply, and help free her from the demons that haunt her. But you must be carefully, if you don't choose the correct doors, you could drive her insane.

Made for Minijam 109: Depth/s!
